short_description: asset advocates law is a real estate attorney based in las vegas, nevada, united states.
long_description: we are a full-service law firm dedicated to providing top-quality legal representation to our clients in the areas of real estate and contract law. with a team of experienced attorneys and support staff, we have the knowledge and expertise to handle all of your legal needs. asset advocates was founded in 2010 by a group of attorneys with a passion for real estate and contract law. our attorneys have a wealth of experience in the legal industry, with many of them having practiced for over 20 years. they have a deep understanding of the laws and regulations that govern real estate transactions and contracts, and are skilled at navigating the complex legal landscape to ensure that our clients' interests are protected. our team of attorneys and support staff is dedicated to providing the highest level of service to our clients. we take pride in our ability to work closely with our clients to understand their unique legal needs and goals, and we are committed to finding solutions that are tailored to their specific circumstances.
